newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - FileNet cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - FileNet cut to hold.

text.p: -- ABN AMRO Chicago Corp said Wednesday it cut its rating for FileNet Corp to hold from buy following the company's reported loss of $0.60 a share in the quarter ended March 31.
-- ABN AMRO said its estimate for the period was a profit of $0.15 a share. FileNet also plans to take a restructuring charge in the quarter ending June 30 and reduce its head count, ABN AMRO said.
-- The rating cut stems primarily from a lack of earnings and revenue visibility, ABN AMRO said.
-- FileNet has a well-regarded product line and the potential for strong price pressure in the near term, making the comapny an interesting acquisition target, ABN AMRO said.
-- Its shares were off 5-1/4 Wednesday at 10-5/8.
